name: Sanjit Majumdar

education.title: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science and Engineering

about:
I consider myself a value adder. I resolute to being a key asset of objective teams while seeking value from colleagues to add to my strengths. I love computer science and information technology.

I have acquired experience building industry standard, production ready applications from working as a full time software developer and being a full time technology hobbyist.
